revised_title: Influence of Chemical Energy of Electrolytes on Voltaic Couples
tldr: The author investigates the influence of chemical energy of electrolytes on the'minimum point' and change of potential of a voltaic couple in water. The study examines the effects of various substances and their concentrations on the electromotive force and the balance of the voltaic couple. The results show that the minimum proportion of a substance required to upset the balance is highly dependent on the chemical composition of the substance and its state of combination when dissolved.
